item.description:
*******************************
Postponed from May 8th to June 12th

*******************************

I plan on taking my 9 year old daughter on Sat morning when F1 Boston has a race day for Juniors. If any of you would like to join, please fill out the registration form and submit it via fax or e-mail.

I'm entering my daughter in the 3B group which starts at 10:30 am. If you are opting for other groups, please look up the time, as they start from 8:30 am onward, and are split between Saturday and Sunday.

Children 7 to 17 are eligible to participate. They should already have completed F1
Bostonâ€™s Junior Novice Racing Academy or Camp successfully and should be holding a F1 Boston Junior Competition License (If your child does not have a license, you can get details of the 2 and 3 day racing academy here and the 5 day racing academy here.)

The cost for a race is $65 payable to F1 Boston.

Each participant gets 1 practise session and 3 race sessions.

The Karts are smaller and are underpowered compared to the arrive and drive adult karts. The power and size varies as well based on the grouping.

Groups 1A and 1B use the RIMO Kart.
Groups 3A and 3B use the 50's Kart.
All others use the 70's Kart.
item.name: Junior Indoor Racing
